unnormalised: triangleachea shetrachea babtint prashnacher vichar korunk, Heronachem sutr vaprun, dileleo बाजू a=3cm, b=4cm & c=5cm, ardhi-gher 's' (3+4+5)/2 = 6cm asa. dekhun, shetrafal sqrt(s(s-a)(s-b)(s-c)) = sqrt(6(6-3)(6-4)(6-5)) = sqrt(6*3*2*1) = sqrt(36) = 6 chौरस सें.मी. asa. त्रिकोणमितीचोय उपेग करुं येता, punn zannkar zalleleo baju astana ही पद्धत sadharanponni sopi asta. upayojan korchea poilim dokładnośćache लेख तपास.
normalised: ek triangleachea area vixim vicharlelea prosnacher, Heronachem formula vaprun, dilelea bazum a sumar tin centimeter, b sumar char centimeter ani c sumar panch centimeter asa, semi-perimeter 's' sumar tin plus char plus panch bhagile don sumar so centimeter. Mhunon, area sumar sacha square root gunile s minus a gunile s minus b gunile s minus c sumar sacha square root so gunile so minus tin gunile so minus char gunile so minus panch sumar sacha square root so gunile tin gunile don gunile ek sumar sacha square root tisa so sumar so square centimeter. Trigonometry sud'dha vaprunk zata, punn he paddot generally mahit aslelea bazumchea lambayan khatir sadhi asta. Application korche adim calculationsachi kharchai tankasni korun ghea.
